answers.answer: _Glenn,Diabetes can have many affects in the eye including retinal problems and cataract.  I doubt that diabetes can affect color perception unless there is a cataract.  Another possibility is optic nerve problems.You should have a complete eye exam with your ophthalmolgist.This information is provided for educational purposes only.  Please see you physician for diagnostic and treatment options.Sincerely,HFHS MD - NI

question: WHEN I CLOSE MY RIGHT EYE MY LEFT EYE HAS A SLIGHT YELLOW CAST TO IT.WHEN I CLOSE MY LEFT EYE MY RIGHT EYE HAS A SLIGHT RED CAST TO IT.THIS IS MORE PRONONCED WHEN I AM OUT IN SUN LIGHT.DOES THIS HAVE ANY THING TO DO WITH MY DEABETES?
title: RED AND YELLOW CAST
